translation:
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

Here presented himself the German Pedro José, a soldier who recently deserted from the army, saying that he had already presented himself to Your Excellency Your Excellency Your Excellency

God keep Your Excellency Military Command Headquarters of the municipality of Santo Antônio, Santo Antônio, January 9, 1844. Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Field Marshal Tomás José da Silva, Distinguished Commander of the Garrison of Porto Alegre. (a) Antônio de Melo e Albuquerque Colonel Military Commander of the municipality of Santo Antônio.

Answered on January 15.
